data.name: btnPrintSetup.Text
data.value: バーコードプリンター設定

data.name: layBarcode.QuerySQL
data.value: SELECT DISTINCT MIN(A.JUNDAL_GUBUN) JUNDAL_GUBUN , MIN(DECODE(B.JUNDAL_GUBUN_NAME,NULL,NVL(FN_CPL_HANGMOG_MARK_NAME(A.SPECIMEN_SER)||' '||NVL(FN_CPL_CODE_NAME_RE('01',A.JUNDAL_GUBUN),FN_CPL_CODE_NAME('01',A.JUNDAL_GUBUN)),NVL(FN_CPL_CODE_NAME_RE('01',A.JUNDAL_GUBUN),FN_CPL_CODE_NAME('01',A.JUNDAL_GUBUN))),B.JUNDAL_GUBUN_NAME)) JUNDAL_GUBUN_NAME , ' ' SPECIMEN_CODE , MIN(NVL(FN_CPL_CODE_NAME_RE('04',A.SPECIMEN_CODE),FN_CPL_CODE_NAME('04',A.SPECIMEN_CODE))) SPECIMEN_NAME , MIN(NVL(B.JANGBI_OUT_CODE3,B.OUT_TUBE2)) TUBE_CODE , MIN(NVL(FN_CPL_CODE_NAME_RE('02',B.OUT_TUBE2),NVL(FN_CPL_CODE_NAME_RE('02',A.TUBE_CODE),FN_CPL_CODE_NAME('02',A.TUBE_CODE)))) TUBE_NAME , NVL(B.UITAK_CODE,MAX(A.EMERGENCY)) IN_OUT_GUBUN --여기에서 응급여부를 관리 dw를 다시 고쳐야해서 그냥 이필드로 감 , A.SPECIMEN_SER SPECIMEN_SER , MIN(A.BUNHO) BUNHO , MIN(NVL(C.SUNAME2,'NO KATAKANA')) SUNAME , MIN(DECODE(A.IN_OUT_GUBUN,'I',FN_BAS_LOAD_GWA_NAME(A.HO_DONG,SYSDATE),FN_BAS_LOAD_GWA_NAME(A.GWA,SYSDATE))) GWA_NAME , ' ' DANGER_YN , 'a'||A.SPECIMEN_SER||'a' SPECIMEN_SER_BA , MIN(A.JANGBI_CODE) JANGBI_CODE , MIN(NVL(FN_CPL_CODE_NAME_RE('07',B.JANGBI_CODE),FN_CPL_CODE_NAME('07',B.JANGBI_CODE))) JANGBI_NAME , MIN(SUBSTR(A.SPECIMEN_SER,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.SPECIMEN_SER,7)) GUMSA_NAME_RE -- 이 필드로 날짜별 키 구분 , FN_CPL_TUBE_COUNT(A.SPECIMEN_SER) TUBE_COUNT , MIN(D.CODE_NAME_RE2||DECODE(D.CODE_NAME_RE2,NULL,NULL,'mL')) TUBE_MAX_AMT , MIN(FN_CPL_TUBE_NUMBERING(A.BUNHO,A.ORDER_DATE,A.ORDER_TIME,A.SPECIMEN_SER)) TUBE_NUMBERING FROM CPL0109 D , OUT0101 C , CPL0101 B , CPL2010 A WHERE B.HOSP_CODE = FN_ADM_LOAD_HOSP_CODE() AND A.HOSP_CODE = B.HOSP_CODE AND C.HOSP_CODE = B.HOSP_CODE AND D.HOSP_CODE(+) = B.HOSP_CODE AND A.SPECIMEN_SER = :f_specimen_ser AND B.HANGMOG_CODE = A.HANGMOG_CODE AND B.SPECIMEN_CODE = A.SPECIMEN_CODE AND B.EMERGENCY = A.EMERGENCY AND C.BUNHO = A.BUNHO AND B.OUT_TUBE2 IS NOT NULL -- SRL 또는 별도 라벨필요할 경우 AND D.CODE_TYPE(+) = '02' AND D.CODE(+) = B.TUBE_CODE GROUP BY A.SPECIMEN_SER, B.UITAK_CODE, B.OUT_TUBE2, A.JUNDAL_GUBUN UNION SELECT DISTINCT MIN(A.JUNDAL_GUBUN) JUNDAL_GUBUN , MIN(DECODE(B.JUNDAL_GUBUN_NAME,NULL,NVL(FN_CPL_HANGMOG_MARK_NAME(A.SPECIMEN_SER)||' '||NVL(FN_CPL_CODE_NAME_RE('01',A.JUNDAL_GUBUN),FN_CPL_CODE_NAME('01',A.JUNDAL_GUBUN)),NVL(FN_CPL_CODE_NAME_RE('01',A.JUNDAL_GUBUN),FN_CPL_CODE_NAME('01',A.JUNDAL_GUBUN))),B.JUNDAL_GUBUN_NAME)) JUNDAL_GUBUN_NAME , ' ' SPECIMEN_CODE , MIN(NVL(FN_CPL_CODE_NAME_RE('04',A.SPECIMEN_CODE),FN_CPL_CODE_NAME('04',A.SPECIMEN_CODE))) SPECIMEN_NAME , MIN(B.TUBE_CODE) TUBE_CODE , MIN(NVL(FN_CPL_CODE_NAME_RE('02',A.TUBE_CODE),FN_CPL_CODE_NAME('02',A.TUBE_CODE))) TUBE_NAME , NVL(B.UITAK_CODE,MAX(A.EMERGENCY)) IN_OUT_GUBUN --여기에서 응급여부를 관리 dw를 다시 고쳐야해서 그냥 이필드로 감 , A.SPECIMEN_SER SPECIMEN_SER , MIN(A.BUNHO) BUNHO , MIN(NVL(C.SUNAME2,'NO KATAKANA')) SUNAME , MIN(DECODE(A.IN_OUT_GUBUN,'I',FN_BAS_LOAD_GWA_NAME(A.HO_DONG,SYSDATE),FN_BAS_LOAD_GWA_NAME(A.GWA,SYSDATE))) GWA_NAME , ' ' DANGER_YN , 'a'||A.SPECIMEN_SER||'a' SPECIMEN_SER_BA , MIN(A.JANGBI_CODE) JANGBI_CODE , MIN(NVL(FN_CPL_CODE_NAME_RE('07',B.JANGBI_CODE),FN_CPL_CODE_NAME('07',B.JANGBI_CODE))) JANGBI_NAME , MIN(SUBSTR(A.SPECIMEN_SER,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.SPECIMEN_SER,7)) GUMSA_NAME_RE -- 이 필드로 날짜별 키 구분 , FN_CPL_TUBE_COUNT(A.SPECIMEN_SER) TUBE_COUNT , MIN(D.CODE_NAME_RE2||DECODE(D.CODE_NAME_RE2,NULL,NULL,'mL')) TUBE_MAX_AMT , MIN(FN_CPL_TUBE_NUMBERING(A.BUNHO,A.ORDER_DATE,A.ORDER_TIME,A.SPECIMEN_SER)) TUBE_NUMBERING FROM CPL0109 D , OUT0101 C , CPL0101 B , CPL2010 A WHERE B.HOSP_CODE = FN_ADM_LOAD_HOSP_CODE() AND A.HOSP_CODE = B.HOSP_CODE AND C.HOSP_CODE = B.HOSP_CODE AND D.HOSP_CODE(+) = B.HOSP_CODE AND A.SPECIMEN_SER = :f_specimen_ser AND B.HANGMOG_CODE = A.HANGMOG_CODE AND B.SPECIMEN_CODE = A.SPECIMEN_CODE AND B.EMERGENCY = A.EMERGENCY AND C.BUNHO = A.BUNHO AND D.CODE_TYPE(+) = '02' AND D.CODE(+) = B.TUBE_CODE GROUP BY A.SPECIMEN_SER, B.UITAK_CODE, B.JANGBI_OUT_CODE3, A.JUNDAL_GUBUN ORDER BY 8

data.name: xLabel1.Text
data.value: ★再出力したいバーコードを読込んで下さい。
